channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jury selection in Sean 'Diddy' Combs sex trafficking trial begins today
item.description: The trial for the rap mogul, who faces criminal charges for sex trafficking, racketeering conspiracy and transporting to engage in prostitution, is un...

item.title: 'Tailoring Black style' is the theme of the 2025 Met Gala. Here's what to know
item.description: Expect to see a focus on menswear: jackets, trousers, suits, hats, and maybe a cane or two.

item.title: Tourist boats capsize in sudden storm in southwest China, leaving 10 dead
item.description: More than 80 people fell into a river when strong winds hit the scenic area in Guizhou province late Sunday afternoon, state broadcaster CCTV said.

item.title: A Soviet probe orbiting Earth since 1972 will soon reenter the planet's atmosphere
item.description: Kosmos 482 has been orbiting the Earth for decades. It's still unknown if the craft will fall to Earth intact or burn up upon atmospheric reentry.

item.title: NIH cuts baby 'Safe to Sleep' team. Here's what parents should know
item.description: For three decades the NIH has led 'Safe to Sleep,' helping parents reduce the risk of sudden infant death syndrome (SIDS) and other sleep-related inju...

item.title: Indigenous people raise awareness about their missing and murdered
Nationalist Simion wins first round of Romanian election rerun
item.description: Romania's previous presidential election was cancelled over allegations of campaign fraud and Russian interference.

item.title: 7 Iranians arrested in U.K. counterterrorism operations, officials say
item.description: British authorities say 8 men, at least 7 of them Iranian, have been arrested in London and 2 other areas over a specific attack plot and a separate s...

item.title: In battle against transgender rights, Trump targets HUD’s housing policies
Trump says non-US movies to be hit with 100% tariffs
item.description: The president blamed foreign-made movies for the American film industry's "very fast death".

item.title: Divorce lawyer arrested 12 years after Ohio nurse stabbed to death
item.description: The arrest of 51-year-old Gregory J. Moore marks the latest twist in a cold case that has eluded Ohio authorities since 2013.

item.title: From debate to dialogue: In a contentious era, ‘Ethics Bowl’ offers students a gentler alternative
item.description: The National High School Ethics Bowl has just concluded its competition at the University of North Carolina, Chapel Hill.

item.title: Israel security cabinet approves plan to expand Gaza offensive
item.description: The Israeli military has called up tens of thousands of reservists, saying it is aiming to increase pressure on Hamas.

item.title: NZ airport to remove Hobbit-themed eagle sculptures
item.description: For more than a decade, the giant eagles have cast a watchful eye over visitors at Wellington Airport.

item.title: Met Gala theme "Superfine: Tailoring Black Style" explained
item.description: The Met Gala is back for 2025 in NYC, shining a spotlight on Black dandyism. Here's what to know about this year's theme explained.

item.title: The Real ID deadline is approaching. Here's what to know.
item.description: Americans will be required to switch to the new form of identification by Wednesday, May 7, if they want to fly domestically.

item.title: Trump orders reopening of notorious Alcatraz prison
item.description: President Trump says the famous island prison off San Francisco is to be reopened to house "ruthless and violent" offenders.

item.title: 3 dead, 5 hurt in shooting at Glendale, Arizona steakhouse, police say
item.description: Glendale, Arizona police say three people are dead and five injured after a shooting at a business Sunday night. No one was under arrest.
